text: When you use a Get Well software product, we may collect information from you automatically through first-party cookies or similar technology.
Most personal data collected by Get Well is provided to Get Well directly by you and/or your healthcare provider.

text: Get Well securely stores personal data collected from its software product users for as long as it is necessary to achieve the purpose for which it was collected, used, or disclosed, or as long as may be required by relevant law.
Get Well may also collect personal data indirectly from you via tools such as Google Analytics, or via Get Well-managed first party cookies.
